M

mitZweiteSaeule(int) - Static method in class link.jaeger.steuerabzug3a.Steuerabzug3a
Return the maximal deductible amount for a given fiscal year for a person with an affiliation to a second pillar institution.

O

ohneZweiteSaeule(int) - Static method in class link.jaeger.steuerabzug3a.Steuerabzug3a
Return the maximal deductible amount for a given fiscal year for a person without an affiliation to a second pillar institution.

S

Steuerabzug3a - Class in link.jaeger.steuerabzug3a
Utility class to get the maximal deductible amount for a given fiscal year
